Terrain::CommonTerrainBlock1

This class implements the BaseTerrainBlock interface for the second generation of terrain. More...

Classes

struct  TerrainBlockHeader

Detailed Description

This class implements the BaseTerrainBlock interface for the second generation of terrain.

bool CommonTerrainBlock1::load ( std::string const &  filename,
Matrix const &  worldTransform,
Vector3 const &  cameraPosition,
std::string *  error = NULL 
) [virtual]

This function loads an BaseTerrainBlock from a DataSection.

Parameters:
filename A file to load the terrain block from.
worldPosition The position in the world of this terrain block.
cameraPosition The position in the world of the camera (for initial LoD calculations).
error If not null and there was an error loading the terrain then this will be set to a description of the problem.
Returns:
True if the load was completely successful, false if a problem occured.

Implements Terrain::BaseTerrainBlock.

bool CommonTerrainBlock1::postLoad ( std::string const &  filename,
Matrix const &  worldTransform,
Vector3 const &  cameraPosition,
DataSectionPtr  pTerrain,
TextureLayers &  textureLayers,
std::string *  error 
) [protected, virtual]

This function gets called when CommonTerrainBlock1::load is done.

Derived classes can use to load further sections or do something with the texture layers.

Parameters:
filename The file that was used to load the block.
worldPosition The position of the block in the world.
cameraPosition The position of the camera in the world.
pTerrain The DataSection used to load the block.
textureLayers The texture layers used to load the block.
error If an error occurs during loading then this will be set to an error string.

Reimplemented in Terrain::TerrainBlock1.
